title: Print, "Projet d'un Tombeau fait pour Mr. le President de la * * * * * à Dijon en 1733 (Design for a Tomb for President * * * * * in Dijon in 1733), plate 99, from Oeuvres de Juste-Aurèle Meissonnier (Works by Juste-Aurèle Meissonnier)", 1748
signed: Signed in plate, lower left: J. A. Meissonnier inv.; lower right: Ingram Sculp.
inscribed: Inscribed in plate, upper right: 99; lower center: Projet d'un Tombeau fait pour Mr. le President de la * * * * * à Dijon en 1733. / A Paris chés Huquier rue St. Jacque au coin de celle des Mathurins C.P.R.
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: tomb with two central figures, one reclined on rocaille formation, with right hand on head, left hand holding had of second figure who leans over and holds a book upright in his right hand. tombe topped with two putti and urn; standing putto holds head in hand, while seated putto engraves urn. Architectural indoor background with window behind tomb and columns on either side.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Projet d'un Tombeau fait pour Mr. le President de la * * * * * à Dijon en 1733 (Design for a Tomb for President * * * * * in Dijon in 1733), plate 99, from Oeuvres de Juste-Aurèle Meissonnier (Works by Juste-Aurèle Meissonnier)", 1748.
1748. Engraving on white laid paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1921-6-212-57.
